mapper.select: select board.*, members. member_name as member_name, lecture.lecture_title as lecture_title, '후기' as category from board inner join members on board.member_id = members.member_id inner join lecture on board.lecture_id = lecture.lecture_id where members.grade='학생' order by board_id desc

mapper.insert: insert into board(board_id, board_title, board_content, member_id, lecture_id) values(#{articleNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member_id}, #{lecture_id})
